headline: PIZZA HUT® RELEASES SECOND ANNUAL PIZZA TRENDS REPORT UNVEILING AMERICA'S LOVE OF PIZZA AND 2025 INDUSTRY FORECASTING
summary: To kick off the New Year, Pizza Hut releases its second annual Pizza Trends Report featuring the latest research on consumer pizza eating habits and an outlook on emerging trends in the industry. From toppings and unique combinations to pizza eating behaviors and consumption, the report offers a comprehensive look at how Americans continue to embrace their love for pizza.

headline: Yum! Brands cancels franchise deal with IS Gida in Turkey
summary: The termination will result in the temporary closure of 283 KFC and 254 Pizza Hut restaurants across the country.
